page.title: 12LIFE STYLES Pastimes
page.content: 0_13year olds mostly do sports on the public playing field,but some people keep pets and ride their bikes. Toddlers like to ride tricycles or model tractors around the garden. 13_30fellwalking in the Lake District. Bowls behind the pub,dog walking, gardening is done on Saturday and Sundays.People go swimming in private pools.Football at the schools grounds. Fishing on the canal. 30_60years like gardening,fellwalking, smoking,bowls and fishing.Gardening, fellwalking and bowls for exercise. Smoking and fishing are the main relaxing pastimes. 60and overs like smoking,fellwalking, bowls,gardening,walking the dog. Fellwalking gardening and walking the dog are for exercise while bowls is for pleasure and smoking is for relaxation.
